tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nidhi Gupta is a great human being besides being a Brilliant most Competent Doctor. I wish I had known her earlier. 
She immediately identified my problem and suggested immediate treatment.  I was having problem in the gums for the last few weeks.
To my surprise she treated the problem in 30 minutes.
I was very satisfied instantly.
She is really a wonderful person who communicates in very simple way and very meaningfully. 
My Best Wishes for Doctor Nidhi Gupta. 
Prince Mohan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: None
review: I had a very good experience with Dr Visha Gupta and Dr Nikita.. They had relieved my pain  instantly.. I was in pain for  last 1 1.5 month.. And had visited various dentist clinic but all in vain.. Dr Vishal has suggested me small RCT so that my pain will go away and i will enjoy my upcoming festival.. Since i have done with the treatment i am not having any pain.. Thanks to God that i have made a correct discuss to visit Dentaris.. Awesome doctor.. And the biggest thing is that they believe in giving right treatment to their patients. Loved their service. Thank you Doctors‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,Mouth Guard,
review: I had been suffering from a highly sensitive tooth after multiple diagnosis and filling treatments over a span of more than 2 years. Eventually I was told that I had to get RCT done. When I approached Dr. Nidhi for the treatment, she was extremely cautious and her first line of treatment was to save the natural tooth. Left with no other option but RCT, Dr. Nidhi was extremely patient in dealing with the inflammation and finally placing the ceramic filling. Last but not the least, Dr. Nidhi has been able to zero in on the cause of my perceived Bruxism. So extremely happy with the care and treatment at her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am grateful for the professionalism and  courteousness of everyone in the office and for Dr Gupta in particular. 
I feel like my needs were attended to with detail and attention, confidence and professional expertise. 
Every question was answered and I felt confident in every step of the treatment and I feel confident in the outcome of the root canal. 
All of my needs were met beyond my expectation. I feel very fortunate to have benefited from the services provided and the kindness and patience from Dr Gupta and staff

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very much satisfied with the dental treatment given by Dr. Nidhi Gupta. She managed time very well, with almost zero waiting time. After taking the x-ray of the teeth, she explained clearly the various steps involved, right from the root canal treatment to making of the crown. She is very pleasant and does the work with great devotion. I can recommend anyone to get dental treatment by her if one seeks my opinion.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Needhi and her entire staff were so welcoming and did an amazing job. I was so impressed by the way they explained their procedures,reasonable charges and wonderful work. They truly care about their patients and oral hygiene!! I recommend them whenever i will get the opportunity !
